Demo of widgetframes in bookdown Preface

Demo of widgetframes in bookdown Bhaskar V. Karambelkar 2017-04-26 Preface Just a demo book to show how widgetframe package can be used along with bookdown for embedding widgets correctly (without having their CSS rules messed up) in gitbooks.

1 Leaflet 1.1 Example 1 library(leaflet) library(widgetframe) ## Loading required package: htmlwidgets l <- leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>% setView(0,0,2) frameWidget(l, height = '400') 1.2 Example 2 l <- leaflet() %>% addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.DarkMatter) %>% setView(0,0,2) frameWidget(l, height = '400')
2 Dygraph 2.1 Example 1 library(dygraphs) ts <- dygraph(nhtemp, main = "New Haven Temperatures") frameWidget(ts, height = 350, width = '95%')

3 DT 3.1 Example 1 library(DT) dt <- datatable( head(iris, 20), options = list( columnDefs = list(list(className = 'dt-center', targets = 5)), pageLength = 5, lengthMenu = c(5, 10, 15, 20)), fillContainer = T) frameWidget(dt, height = 350, width = '95%')
